metadata.name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With WINZIP
metadata.comment: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('winzip.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('winzip64.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-s"')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -min ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -a '))))

output.summary: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities
